comment: The set of functionals having closed kernels is closed under vector (functional) addition. Lemmas ~ lclkrlem2a through ~ lclkrlem2y are used for the proof. Here we express ~ lclkrlem2y in terms of membership in the set ` C ` of functionals with closed kernels. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2015.)
